titles.title: To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Department of Education, School Improvement Program for fiscal year 2024.
To provide for a limitation on availability of funds for Department of Education, School Improvement Program for fiscal year 2024.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This bill specifies that no FY2024 funding is authorized to be appropriated or made available for the Department of Education's School Improvement Programs account.
